definition: variant of 陽臺|阳台[yang2 tai2]

sentences.english: At the moment, very quiet night, the eighth floor rooftop terrace is a kiosk hospital.
sentences.chinese: 此刻，夜很静，八楼的楼顶，阳台就是一小亭院。

sentences.english: Romeo gazed up to Juliet on her balcony.
sentences.chinese: 罗蜜欧在阳台上凝视著茱丽叶。

sentences.english: A third floor terrace had a seven-foot privacy wall.
sentences.chinese: 三楼的阳台上有一个7英尺的隐蔽墙。

sentences.english: The balcony juts out over the garden.
Chris unhooked the shutters and went out on the balcony .
sentences.chinese: 克里斯拉开百叶窗，走到了阳台上。

sentences.english: He is draping the banner from the balcony.
sentences.chinese: 他使旗帜成褶皱状从阳台上垂下。

sentences.english: The larger rear block plays on a composition of projecting and recessed balconies.
sentences.chinese: 较大的背面区块上组成了阳台凹凸有致的联合演绎。

sentences.english: An original detail on the East stand.
sentences.chinese: 从一户阳台上看东看台和花园。

sentences.english: John was on the balcony below, looking up at me, and he smiled.
sentences.chinese: 而约翰就在下面的阳台上，仰头望着我，微笑着。

sentences.english: Grapple over the wall, run to the back and grapple onto the upper balcony.
sentences.chinese: 翻墙进去跑到后面然后用抓钩上到上层的阳台。

sentences.english: The outdoor arena is a plane surface surrounded by walls with three levels of balconies on each side.
sentences.chinese: 室外的领域是平面的围墙包围三个层次的阳台，每边。

sentences.english: Besides, there is also a balcony next to the living room and one of the bedrooms.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，紧挨起居室和一间卧室有一个阳台。

sentences.english: Canister of basin piling a basin is placed on the balcony, kind on profusion flowers and plants has eyeful green.
sentences.chinese: 在阳台上摆堆盆盆罐罐，种上缤纷花草就有满眼绿色。

sentences.english: Those are put in the galosh on the balcony, the majority made a patch.
sentences.chinese: 那些放在阳台上的套鞋，绝大部分是打了补丁的。

sentences.english: Tenants aren't permitted to hang laundry on the balcony.
sentences.chinese: 房客不许在阳台上晾衣服。

sentences.english: Each upstairs room opened on a balcony shaded by an overhanging roof.
sentences.chinese: 楼上的每个房间都有飞檐遮阴的阳台。

definition: balcony/patio/flat roof/terrace/deck (unroofed platform)/outdoor stage/ancient imperial celestial observation terrace
drawing room (room for arriving guests)/living room/CL:間|间[jian1]
